Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis' game-winning putback with 0.7 seconds left secured the Sacramento Kings a 111-110 comeback win over the Miami Heat.
Sacramento Kings completed a 15-point comeback against the Miami Heat.
Miami Heat were outscored by 20 points in the third quarter for the second time this season.
Jimmy Butler and Tyler Herro both tallied a game-high 27 points each.
